content:
curiositycasualty opened issue #4064:

Both in the top-level LICENSE file and in the subsidiary ones.

https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/blob/99e9e1395d5d31f4121c8fa5d1d910bac4908006/LICENSE#L190

cfallin commented on issue #4064:

That line is part of the appendix, which states "To apply the Apache License to your work, attach the following boilerplate notice, with the fields enclosed by brackets "[]" replaced with your own identifying information." In other words, that seems to be a bit of the license intended to be that way; it's a set of instructions, and we're not supposed to fill in the info there.

More generally, it seems to be pretty standard to copy the LICENSE file wholesale, without modifying it. For a random example, here's Cargo's copy of the Apache license, with the same line you highlighted:

https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/blob/master/LICENSE-APACHE

Thanks in any case! I'll go ahead and close this issue.

cfallin closed issue #4064:

Both in the top-level LICENSE file and in the subsidiary ones.

https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/blob/99e9e1395d5d31f4121c8fa5d1d910bac4908006/LICENSE#L190
